name: Zoidberg - a modular perl shell
short_description: Zoidberg (a.k.a. zoid) provides a modular Perl shell written, configured, and operated entirely in Perl. It aspires to be a fully operational login shell with all the features one normally expects. !! RELEASES NO LONGER THROUGH SF !!
